alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 4:15AM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches in the valleys and 2 to 4 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
